name: Item Register
query:
SELECT 
`tabItem`.item_code AS "Item Code:Data:100",
`tabItem`.item_name AS "Item Name:Data:180", 
`tabItem`.item_group AS "Group:Data:100",
`tabItem`.item_sub_group AS "Sub Group:Data:120",
`tabItem`.stock_uom AS UOM,
CASE
    WHEN `tabItem`.is_stock_item = 1 
        THEN (select expense_account from `tabItem Default` where `tabItem Default`.parent=`tabItem`.name)
    WHEN `tabItem`.is_fixed_asset = 1
        THEN (select fixed_asset_account from `tabAsset Category Account` where `tabAsset Category Account`.parent=`tabItem`.asset_category)
    ELSE
        ""
END AS "Default Expense Account:Data:250"
FROM `tabItem`
